Industrial-grade IoT Gateway designed for harsh environments with multiple connectivity options.
Key Features: - ARM Cortex-A53 quad-core processor - 2GB RAM, 32GB eMMC storage - 4G/LTE cellular connectivity - Dual-band Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 - Multiple RS-232/422/485 ports - 2x Gigabit Ethernet - MQTT, AMQP, OPC UA protocol support - DIN rail mounting option - Fanless design - Extended temperature range operation

Housing resistant to: - Industrial solvents (isopropyl alcohol, acetone) - Cleaning agents and disinfectants - Petroleum-based oils and lubricants - Dilute acids and bases - Hydraulic fluids
Connectors are sealed against dust, oil, and moisture with IP67 rated caps when not in use.

DNV-GL Maritime Certification IEC 60945 (Maritime navigation equipment) IEC 61850-3 (Power utility automation) EN 50155 (Railway applications) MIL-STD-810G (Military environmental testing) MIL-STD-461G (Electromagnetic compatibility) UL Class I Division 2 (Hazardous locations)

Features integrated temperature regulation system with active thermal management. Conformal coating on all circuit boards provides additional protection against humidity and condensation. Specially designed enclosure includes pressure equalization vent to prevent vacuum or pressure build-up in extreme environments. Tested for 10-year operational life in extreme industrial conditions.
